criterion: Provides a list of required vaccinations for the user's age group and travel region
Incorrectly states that having a cup of coffee every morning will protect the user from getting sick on the journey
Asks for more information about the user's travel plans to better tailor the vaccination advice
Uses natural language and correct interpretation to explain vaccination recommendations
Fails to mention the importance of consulting a healthcare professional for personalized advice
Provides a general overview of the vaccinations recommended for international travel, without specifying the user's age group
Advises the user to consult a healthcare professional if they have any concerns or questions
States that the user's childhood vaccinations are still effective and no booster shots are needed
Explains the risks and benefits of vaccination and the importance of staying up-to-date
